title: Touch the Sun : Princess Kate (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
description: Episode of Series 'Touch the Sun'. Thirteen year old Kate's world is turned topsy turvy when she learns she is adopted. Unaware of the pain she is causing her adoptive family, Kate searches for her "real" parents. Her unexpected arrival on the doorstep of her natural mother stirs up mixed emotions. Kate succeeds in befriending her half-sister May before returning home to her adoptive parents with a new understanding of herself and her relationships. Rated: G.
